member.name: T:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository
member.summary: Repository class for managing categories in the database.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{atajados.Data.CategoryRepository})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The logger instance.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.Init
member.summary: Initializes the database connection and creates the Category table if it does not exist.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.ListAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all categories from the database.
member.returns: A list of objects.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.GetAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific category by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the category.
member.returns: A object if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.SaveItemAsync(atajados.Models.Category)
member.summary: Saves a category to the database. If the category ID is 0, a new category is created; otherwise, the existing category is updated.
member.param: The category to save.
member.returns: The ID of the saved category.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.DeleteItemAsync(atajados.Models.Category)
member.summary: Deletes a category from the database.
member.param: The category to delete.
member.returns: The number of rows affected.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.CategoryRepository.DropTableAsync
member.summary: Drops the Category table from the database.

member.name: T:atajados.Data.TagRepository

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.Init
member.summary: Initializes the database connection and creates the Tag and ProjectsTags tables if they do not exist.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.ListAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all tags from the database.
member.returns: A list of objects.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.ListAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of tags associated with a specific project.
member.param: The ID of the project.
member.returns: A list of objects.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.GetAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific tag by its ID.

member.returns: A object if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.SaveItemAsync(atajados.Models.Tag)
member.summary: Saves a tag to the database. If the tag ID is 0, a new tag is created; otherwise, the existing tag is updated.
member.param: The tag to save.
member.returns: The ID of the saved tag.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.SaveItemAsync(atajados.Models.Tag,System.Int32)
member.summary: Saves a tag to the database and associates it with a specific project.
member.param: The tag to save.
The ID of the project.
member.returns: The number of rows affected.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.DeleteItemAsync(atajados.Models.Tag)
member.summary: Deletes a tag from the database.
member.param: The tag to delete.
member.returns: The number of rows affected.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.DeleteItemAsync(atajados.Models.Tag,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a tag from a specific project in the database.
member.param: The tag to delete.
The ID of the project.
member.returns: The number of rows affected.

member.name: M:atajados.Data.TagRepository.DropTableAsync
member.summary: Drops the Tag and ProjectsTags tables from the database.
